description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=3/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Brimstone is a top-down, Hack'n'Slash Role Playing Game for up to 8 players. Procedurally generated dungeons, a huge variety of monsters and endless variations of loot ensure that no two sessions will ever be the same! Download the free trial now to try it for yourself!
